build-type.name: All-2.2
build-type.description: Triggers the different .NET and mono builds for Npgsql 2.2 (still supports .NET 2.0 and 3.5), collects all artifacts and generates nuget and docs

option.name: artifactRules
option.value: LICENSE.txt => Npgsql-net20.zip README.* => Npgsql-net20.zip LICENSE.txt => Npgsql-net35.zip README.* => Npgsql-net35.zip LICENSE.txt => Npgsql-net40.zip README.* => Npgsql-net40.zip LICENSE.txt => Npgsql-net45.zip README.* => Npgsql-net45.zip LICENSE.txt => Npgsql-net20.tar.gz README.* => Npgsql-net20.tar.gz LICENSE.txt => Npgsql-net35.tar.gz README.* => Npgsql-net35.tar.gz LICENSE.txt => Npgsql-net40.tar.gz README.* => Npgsql-net40.tar.gz LICENSE.txt => Npgsql-net45.tar.gz README.* => Npgsql-net45.tar.gz Npgsql/bin/Release-net20/** => Npgsql-net20.zip Npgsql.EntityFramework/bin/Release-net20/Npgsql.EntityFramework* => Npgsql-net20.zip Npgsql.EntityFramework/bin/Legacy-Release-net20/Npgsql.EntityFramework* => Npgsql-net20.zip Npgsql/bin/Release-net35/** => Npgsql-net35.zip Npgsql.EntityFramework/bin/Release-net35/Npgsql.EntityFramework* => Npgsql-net35.zip Npgsql.EntityFramework/bin/Legacy-Release-net35/Npgsql.EntityFramework* => Npgsql-net35.zip Npgsql/bin/Release-net40/** => Npgsql-net40.zip Npgsql.EntityFramework/bin/Release-net40/Npgsql.EntityFramework* => Npgsql-net40.zip Npgsql.EntityFramework/bin/Legacy-Release-net40/Npgsql.EntityFramework* => Npgsql-net40.zip Npgsql/bin/Release-net45/** => Npgsql-net45.zip Npgsql.EntityFramework/bin/Release-net45/Npgsql.EntityFramework* => Npgsql-net45.zip Npgsql.EntityFramework/bin/Legacy-Release-net45/Npgsql.EntityFramework* => Npgsql-net45.zip Npgsql/bin/Release-net20/** => Npgsql-net20.tar.gz Npgsql.EntityFramework/bin/Release-net20/Npgsql.EntityFramework* => Npgsql-net20.tar.gz Npgsql.EntityFramework/bin/Legacy-Release-net20/Npgsql.EntityFramework* => Npgsql-net20.tar.gz Npgsql/bin/Release-net35/** => Npgsql-net35.tar.gz Npgsql.EntityFramework/bin/Release-net35/Npgsql.EntityFramework* => Npgsql-net35.tar.gz Npgsql.EntityFramework/bin/Legacy-Release-net35/Npgsql.EntityFramework* => Npgsql-net35.tar.gz Npgsql/bin/Release-net40/** => Npgsql-net40.tar.gz Npgsql.EntityFramework/bin/Release-net40/Npgsql.EntityFramework* => Npgsql-net40.tar.gz Npgsql.EntityFramework/bin/Legacy-Release-net40/Npgsql.EntityFramework* => Npgsql-net40.tar.gz Npgsql/bin/Release-net45/** => Npgsql-net45.tar.gz Npgsql.EntityFramework/bin/Release-net45/Npgsql.EntityFramework* => Npgsql-net45.tar.gz Npgsql.EntityFramework/bin/Legacy-Release-net45/Npgsql.EntityFramework* => Npgsql-net45.tar.gz NpgsqlDdexProvider/bin/Release/NpgsqlDdexProvider* => NpgsqlDdexProvider-VS2010.zip NpgsqlDdexProvider/bin/Release-net45/NpgsqlDdexProvider* => NpgsqlDdexProvider-VS2013.zip docs/api/** => docs.zip
